text: Food Unwrapped is a British television series broadcast by Channel 4 featuring Jimmy Doherty, Kate Quilton, Matt Tebbutt, Helen Lawal, Amanda Byram, Andi Oliver, Briony May Williams, Martin Dickie, and James Watt. The show is based on the original series "Food CIA", devised by Dahl TV and licensed by Warner Bros. International Television Production Ltd. There have been fifteen series and a number of special episodes. Presented as a consumer show investigating food production, it was first broadcast on 10 September 2012. ==Series overview== ===Series=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; width:60%;" |- !colspan=2 rowspan=2|Series !rowspan=2|Episodes !colspan=2|Original broadcast |- !Series premiere !Series finale |- | style="background:#AABDD9;"| | Series 1 | 8 | 10 September 2012 | 5 November 2012 |- | style="background:#2211FF;"| | Series 2 | 8 | 3 June 2013 | 29 July 2013 |- | style="background:#FA126A;"| | Series 3 | 6 | 20 January 2014 | 3 March 2014 |- | style="background:#05BF24;"| | Series 4 | 6 | 14 July 2014 | 18 August 2014 |- | style="background:#FF7700;"| | Series 5 | 13 | 12 January 2015 | 25 May 2015 |- | style="background:#EEEE00;"| | Series 6 | 16 | 31 August 2015 | 14 March 2016 |- | style="background:#22FF11;"| | Series 7 | 4 | 25 March 2016 | 15 April 2016 |- | style="background:#66FFAA;"| | Series 8 | 5 | 9 May 2016 | 6 June 2016 |- | style="background:#BBFF66;"| | Series 9 | 7 | 26 September 2016 | 2016 |- | style="background:#BBFF66;"| | Series 10 | 5 | 2017 | 2017 |- | style="background:#BBFF66;"| | Series 11 | 6 | 2017 | 2017 |- | style="background:#BBFF66;"| | Series 12 | 6 | 2017 | 12 Dec. 2017 |- | |Series 13 |9 |4 Jan. 2018 |29 May 2018 |- | |Series 14 |8 |11 Jun. 2018 |27 Aug. 2018 |- | |Series 15 |12 |8 Oct. 2018 |4 Feb. 2019 |- | |Series 16 |TBD |15 Mar. 2019 |TBD |- |} ===Specials=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !
